channel.title: admin on Under construction...
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Under construction...

item.description: My research in empirical banking explores how financial regulations spread between markets. In particular, I have extensively researched the OTC markets for swaps and bonds, the real effects of bank capital regulation, and the effects of non-conventional monetary policy on lending terms. Prior to my PhD, I was a consultant at Frontier Economics in London, where I specialized in regulatory issues and competition policy for financial services.
